ygData.subject: No More Flames, Please
ygData.msgSnippet: Ladies and Gents.. I created this list in hopes of people sharing their experiences and knowledge on any types of smithing within Everquest -- lets try to stop
ygData.messageBody:
Ladies and Gents..

I created this list in hopes of people sharing their experiences and
knowledge on any types of smithing within Everquest -- lets try to stop the
flames and get back to all being friends. =) Anyone else posting flames
will be removed and banned from the list, so lets try to keep it all
civilized!

On that note, if ya have smithy friends, please tell them about the list and
to subscribe! The more people involved, the more knowledge we all have to
draw upon.

Chade
List Owner
Pretty Awful Smith =)
